title: Systems Mapping
description: Visualizing friction points in organizational dynamics.
obstacle: Teams struggled to identify hidden misalignments within internal processes.
idea: I used mapping exercises to surface unseen relational tensions.
reflection: Revealed how visualizing friction points helps align teams with purpose.

title: Customer Journey Mapping
description: Making the invisible touchpoints visible across customer experiences.
obstacle: Fragmented customer experiences created confusion and friction.
idea: Mapped end-to-end journeys to identify pain points and align efforts.
reflection: Visualizing journeys helped uncover misalignments and streamline experiences.

title: Cultural Alignment
description: Bridging gaps between teams and company values through co-created maps.
obstacle: Company values weren't translating into daily team actions.
idea: Facilitated workshops to co-create alignment maps and surface shared goals.
reflection: Increased team engagement by connecting values with tangible workflows.

title: Storytelling in Motion
description: Humanizing complexity through narrative-driven video projects.
obstacle: Abstract ideas struggled to emotionally connect with audiences.
idea: Created narrative videos that bridged the gap between concept and people.
reflection: Storytelling served as a clarity amplifier for complex topics.

title: Visual Storyboards
description: Bringing abstract strategies to life through relatable visual narratives.
obstacle: Strategic plans lacked tangible, actionable connection points.
idea: Developed visual storyboards to make abstract strategies relatable and actionable.
reflection: Storyboards helped teams align around a shared understanding of strategy.

title: Strategy Sketches
description: Quick, iterative diagrams to surface assumptions and provoke clarity.
obstacle: Overly complex strategies failed to resonate with team members.
idea: Used rapid sketching to simplify and communicate key strategic points.
reflection: Sketches fostered collaborative clarity and helped prioritize actions.

title: AI as Amplifier
description: Prototyping clarity tools powered by AI to surface hidden insights.
obstacle: Information overload made key relationships invisible to teams.
idea: Developed AI-driven prototypes to highlight unseen patterns and connections.
reflection: AI amplified human sense-making, supporting better decision-making processes.

title: AI Concept Lab
description: Exploring AI-driven prototypes to support collaborative clarity.
obstacle: Teams were hesitant to explore AI due to lack of practical examples.
idea: Developed low-risk prototypes to experiment with AI augmentations in workflows.
reflection: Hands-on prototypes reduced fears and opened space for AI experimentation.

title: Service Blueprints
description: Visualizing backstage systems and dependencies to streamline service delivery.
obstacle: Teams lacked visibility into the backstage processes behind service experiences.
idea: Mapped internal service blueprints to clarify roles and reduce silos.
reflection: Blueprints exposed critical gaps, enabling smoother internal collaboration.
